pageContext.claim: “Now, in all fairness to Paul, I may have signed [the spending omnibus bill] anyway because it was so much more money than anyone ever thought possible for the military, and equal to the wall and maybe even greater than the wall was my promise to refurbish the military.”
pageContext.analysis: The military has been funded at similar levels over the past two decades. But those spending increases were necessary to support ongoing military efforts in Iraq and Afghanistan. Plus, according to Fact.base, Trump has made over 2,000 references to "the wall" but only over 250 references to the "military" being "depleted" in his public remarks.
